name: CsvTest
description: Test suite for CSV transformation functionalities using the CsvTransformer class.

test_cases.name: csvTestNew
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a custom separator and header.

test_cases.name: csvTestWithQuotesNew
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a custom separator and header, including expressions.

test_cases.name: testCsvWithCommaNew
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a comma separator and no header.

test_cases.name: testCsvWithDifferentObjects
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with different object types.

test_cases.name: testCsvWithDifferentObjectsFunction
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with different object types using functions.

test_cases.name: testCsvWithDifferentObjectsFunctionStream
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with different object types using functions and streams.

test_cases.name: testCsvWithInfiniteSequence
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with an infinite sequence, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testLimitForCsv
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a specified limit.

test_cases.name: testLimitForCsvNew
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a specified limit using a new schema.

test_cases.name: testLimitForCollection
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a specified limit for a collection.

test_cases.name: testLimitForCollectionNew
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with a specified limit for a collection using a new schema.

test_cases.name: testInfiniteCsv
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with an infinite sequence, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testInfiniteCsvWithLimit
test_cases.description: Tests the generation of CSV with an infinite sequence and a specified limit.

test_cases.name: supplierShouldBeDefinedInCaseOfNullInput
test_cases.description: Tests that an exception is thrown if the input is null and no suppliers are defined.
